caption:
This photograph captures a tranquil park scene under a clear blue sky. The composition is framed by dark, leafy branches of foreground trees on the left and top, which cast detailed shadows upon the grass below, enhancing the lush, verdant setting. The main area of the park is an expansive grassy field, dotted with several trees of various sizes and fullness, which are scattered throughout the landscape, contributing to a sense of openness and natural beauty.

In the distance, a few people are visible, engaging in leisurely activities. The presence of these individuals, along with their casual attire and relaxed postures, suggests they might be enjoying a walk or other recreational activities in the park setting.

The backdrop of the scene is marked by a striking mountain range, slightly shrouded by haze, which adds a sense of depth and grandeur to the scene. The overall ambiance conveyed by the image is peaceful and idyllic, typical of a serene day in a communal green space.
title: This municipal golf course was built on sanitary landfill.
